pullrequest.title: [Acropolis][WIP] Mutex to protect systems added on demand

content.raw:
> we currently queue entity removal, but creation takes effect immediately

I see, I was mis-remembering, I thought that we queued on both addition and removal.

> where the system is always tied to an entity

I’m not sure I understand what you mean by this?  I didn’t think that there was any relationship between loaded systems and entities unless explicitly created by a plugin.  Are we creating entities for each system as it stands?
